markdownRemark.excerpt: Pescetti also authored a small Latin textbook, which I have never seen: Tabulae ad grammaticam celeriter et feliciter perdiscendum utilissimae, in quibus unoâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: Pescetti also authored a small Latin textbook, which I have never seen: Tabulae ad grammaticam celeriter et feliciter perdiscendum utilissimae, in quibus uno velut intuiti, quicquid ad hanc artem pertinet, inspicere licet (Verona, Tamo, 1600). This title implies that it took the form of a summary aimed at beginners. At this date it was clearly intended as part of Pescetti's campaign against the Alvares grammar.
